name: Puffy Man
description:
Puffy Man is a 2D Platformer that puts a twist on the usual platformer formula. Your run of the mill jump is replaced with a jetpack-like thrust.

You play as Puffy Man, tasked with stopping the evil Red Magician and ridding the inhabitants of Wonder World of his spell. 

Controls:

esc: disable fullscreen (this game has been set up with fullscreen in mind)
